document_data.name: Adolmus
document_data.Personality: He loved the mountains and stones of [[Toril]], and detested everything that could fly.
document_data.Possessions: Adolmus wore a ''[[cloak of protection]]'', and carried a magic ''[[mace]]'' and a ''[[wand of defoliation]]''. He also wore a ''[[ring of fire resistance]]'' and a ''[[ring of earth elemental command]]'' on his fingers.
document_data.History: Adolmus helped defeat two [[dragon]]s on separate occasions, a fact of which he was very proud.
